onboarding_subtitle_3: Save your favorite articles to your library to read them anytime.

terms_and_conditions:
Please read these terms carefully before using Nuntium. By accessing or using the app, you agree to be bound by these terms:

1. Nature of Service: Nuntium is a news aggregation and information platform. While we strive to provide accurate content, we do not guarantee the absolute accuracy or completeness of all information provided.

2. Intellectual Property: All text, images, logos, and the 'Nuntium' trademark are the property of the app owners or their respective news providers. Commercial reproduction is strictly prohibited.

3. External Links: The app may contain links to external sites. Nuntium is not responsible for the content or privacy practices of these third-party websites.

4. User Conduct: The app is for personal use only. Use of automated systems to extract data is prohibited. Users must maintain respectful behavior in any interactive sections.

5. Disclaimer of Liability: Nuntium content is provided 'as is' for informational purposes only. We are not liable for any decisions made based on the news published within the app.

6. Amendments: We reserve the right to modify these terms or app features at any time to enhance the user experience.

7. Governing Law: These terms are governed by and construed in accordance with the local laws of the operating country.
privacy_policy_content:
Last updated: January 2026

1. Introduction
Welcome to Nuntium. We are committed to protecting your personal information and your right to privacy. This Privacy Policy explains what information we collect, how we use it, and what rights you have in relation to it.

2. Information We Collect
We collect personal information that you provide to us, such as name and email, when you register. We also collect usage data automatically, including your device IP address, browser type, and pages visited within the app to improve your experience.

3. How We Use Your Information
We use the information we collect to:
- Provide and maintain our news service.
- Personalize your news feed based on your favorite topics.
- Send you technical notices, updates, and security alerts.
- Analyze usage patterns to improve app performance.

4. Data Sharing and Disclosure
We do not sell your personal data. We may share information with third-party service providers (like analytics or cloud hosting) who perform services for us, provided they comply with our privacy standards.

5. Your Data Protection Rights
You have the right to access, update, or delete the personal information we have on you. If you wish to exercise these rights, please contact us via the profile settings.

6. Changes to This Policy
We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
usernameLengthError: Username must be between 3 and 15 characters
